com.kirill.kochnev.websocket

Class RxSocketWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kirill.kochnev.websocket.RxSocketWrapper

  • public class RxSocketWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    The main purpose of this class is to wrap Socket with RxJava 2 calls for more comfortable usage
